import React from "react"; export const SectionBlog = () =>{ const [posts, setPosts] = React.useState([]); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = React.useState(false); const [isError, setIsError] = React.useState(false); const fetchData = () => { fetch('https://cdn.lk-ft.ru/posts') .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { setIsLoading(false); setPosts(data); }) .catch((error) => { setIsLoading(false); setIsError(true); console.log(error); }); }; React.useEffect(() => { fetchData(); }, []); if (isLoading) { return
Загрузка...
